attributes.action: Extend the free 30hrs of childcare for working parents to include 0-2 year olds
attributes.background: Currently all working parents which children aged 3 to 4 will get free childcare whilst working parents of children aged 0-2 will still have to pay which represents inequality

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183916
